Package templeengine.src.core

Class QuadTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • templeengine.src.core.QuadTree

  • public class QuadTree
extends java.lang.Object
    The QuadTree is a relatively simple class to help reduce the expensive collision check calls.

    QuadTree splits the parent quadrant into 4 quadrants based on the amount of objects in the quadrant. If the amount of objects in the quadrant exceeds the MAXOBJS the quadrant will split into 4 quadrants. An object in a quadrant will only be collision checked against other objects in the same quadrant. An object between quadrants will as of the moment be checked against every other object.

      • retrieve

        public int retrieve​(java.util.ArrayList<CollisionInterface> returnObjects,
                    CollisionInterface obj)
        Retrieves an ArrayList of the objects in the same quadrant as the object desired. This function modifies the given returnObjects array, and returns an int.
        Parameters:
        returnObjects - the list of objects in the same quadrant as obj.
        obj - the object of which to retrieve the quadrants objects from.
        Returns:
        index of the obj, -1 if between quadrants, 0 for right-top, 1 for left-top, 2 for left-bottom, 3 for right-bottom.
